items.title: Chipotle Stock Falls After Earnings. Comparable Store Sales Are the Worry.
items.description: Much of Chipotle’s revenue growth was driven by footprint expansion. Same-store sales for existing restaurants, however, declined 4% from a year ago.

items.title: Meme Stock Euphoria Spreads as Retail Traders Pick New Wagers
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Meme stock mania is spreading to a growing number of speculative stocks, underscoring the appetite among retail traders for riskier bets with the market at all-time highs. items.title: Krispy Kreme: The Meme-Stock Surge Offers An Opportunity To Cut Losses (Downgrade)
McDonald's (MCD) Declares US$1.77 Quarterly Dividend Payable September 2025
items.description: On July 22, 2025, McDonald's (MCD) reaffirmed its quarterly dividend of $1.77 per share, reinforcing its dedication to shareholder value, with the payment scheduled for mid-September. Meanwhile, the S&P 500 hit new highs amidst trade deal optimism, buoying broader market sentiment and echoing the upward trend with a 1.3% rise over the past week. Amid this favorable backdrop, McDonald's saw its share price climb by 4.07% over the last month, aligning with bullish market conditions, suggesting...
